name: Wheelie Life
description:
Welcome to Wheelie Life 2, a game of motorcycles and wheelies with fun physics and not very difficult to learn.
If you are looking for a game where you can spend time with your friends, this is the one.
You can create rooms to play with your friends, or you can also meet new people in the public rooms. Also you can choose between the different bikes there are and customize your rider.

More features:
- Advanced realistic physics
- Rider fall simulation
- Different bikes to choose
- Customize your rider
- Online and offline mode
- Play with your friends
- Create your own online rooms
- Large map
